home.title: SFB
home.intro-description: Sustainable Form Builder empowers teams to reveal insightful data, with top-notch security standards. In a seamless flow without writing one line of code
home.security-description: We handle spam submissions and keep your inbox safe
home.zero-description: Zero trust layer allows you to specify permitted or restricted audience to secure your form
home.hosting-description: ensuring that your data remains protected and compliant with the highest security standards.
home.customization-title: Elevate Communication and Branding with Advanced Customization Options
home.feature-diversity-description: Request any type of information, collect files, and process payments with a sustainable form builder.
home.feature-regex-description: Gather precise, error-free data with field validation using custom regex.
home.feature-condition-logic-description: Guides users through a smooth form experience with a clear, step-by-step flow and well-organized layout.
home.feature-secure-collaboration-description: Share form results securely with your team and external partners. Maintain data integrity and privacy
home.feature-auto-response-description: Set auto-responses for your form, make it dynamic use our email templates, setup under 2 minutes.
home.feature-email-notification-description: No need to monitor for new submissions; you'll automatically receive an email notification for each one.
home.insights-description: Analyze data effortlessly and make informed decisions based on valuable insights.
home.simplify-management-description: Stay organized on top of submissions with features such as marking as spam & favorite, and tagging.
home.informed-decision-description: Analyze data easily and make better decisions based on reliable and valuable data.
home.integration-title: Flawless integrations with your favorite tools
home.integration-description: Effortlessly connect your workspace with your preferred service provider to maximize form capabilities.
home.audience-title: Ideal for everyone, but especially for ↓
home.audience-enterprise-description: Perfect for enterprises with large and sensitive systems, enabling them to maintain top-notch security standards effortlessly
home.audience-agencies-description: Ideal for agencies needing customizable contact forms, offering complete flexibility without manual work or digital coding.
home.audience-students-description: A valuable tool for students to easily build and share forms, gather data —all without writing a single line of code.
